author: rooneg
msg: To satisfy those who want their ChangeLog's in GNU style rather than svn
style, here's a script to munge the output of 'svn log' into something that
approaches GNU ChangeLog style.
If someone is really motivated, they could grab some code from cvs2cl.pl and
make this do line wrapping and formatting, but this is at least a start.
This closes (barely) issue #610, although there are several useful suggestions
in the issue that a motivated individual could take and add to this script.
* tools/dev/gnuify-changelog.pl
new file.

author: kfogel
msg: * index.html: Reorganize goals list, now that we know what's in 1.0.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Change usage for `info' to reflect an optional
first target.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/info-cmd.c
(svn_cl__info): Allow implict `.' target.  Rearrange some logic in
this function.

author: rooneg
msg: * HACKING
(Directory Layout): we no longer have an expat-lite subdirectory, so we
don't need to explain why it's there.

author: rooneg
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/util.c
(svn_cl__edit_externally): remove an extraneous allocation and a variable
that wasn't being used for anything (well, at least it wasn't being used
for anything after i got rid of the allocation).
